example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تتدارك) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PUNC :) (S (PUNC ") (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (NP-1 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM اللاجئ)) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يقود) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC دراجة) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC نارية)) (PP-MNR (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN دون) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN رخصة)))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: The refugee was driving a motorcycle without a license

example.arg: كان اللاجئ يقود دراجة نارية من دون رخصة

frameset.edef: to follow or succeed one another

role.argrole: entity or things that come one after the other

frameset.edef: to beaware of, to guard against

example.parse: تدارك الرجل خطرا كاد أن يؤدي بحياته
